name: getLists
description: Get information about all lists in the account.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

exclude_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

count.description: The number of records to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 1000

offset.description: Used for [pagination](https://mailchimp.com/developer/marketing/docs/methods-parameters/#pagination), this it the number of records from a collection to skip. Default value is 0.

before_date_created.description: Restrict response to lists created before the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

since_date_created.description: Restrict results to lists created after the set date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

before_campaign_last_sent.description: Restrict results to lists created before the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

since_campaign_last_sent.description: Restrict results to lists created after the last campaign send date. Uses ISO 8601 time format: 2015-10-21T15:41:36+00:00.

email.description: Restrict results to lists that include a specific subscriber's email address.

sort_field.description: Returns files sorted by the specified field.

sort_dir.description: Determines the order direction for sorted results.

has_ecommerce_store.description: Restrict results to lists that contain an active, connected, undeleted ecommerce store.

include_total_contacts.description: Return the total_contacts field in the stats response, which contains an approximate count of all contacts in any state.

$block: A collection of subscriber lists for this account. Lists contain subscribers who have opted-in to receive correspondence from you or your organization.

$ul: **_links**: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.
**constraints**: Do particular authorization constraints around this collection limit creation of new instances?

**current_total_instances**: How many total instances of this resource are already in use? This is independent of any filter conditions applied to the query. Value may be larger than max_instances. As a special case, -1 is returned when access is unlimited.
**max_instances**: How many total instances of this resource are allowed? This is independent of any filter conditions applied to the query. As a special case, -1 indicates unlimited.
**may_create**: May the user create additional instances of this resource?
**lists**: An array of objects, each representing a list.
**total_items**: The total number of items matching the query regardless of pagination.

$ul: **detail**: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. [Learn more about errors](/developer/guides/get-started-with-mailchimp-api-3/#Errors).
**instance**: A string that identifies this specific occurrence of the problem. Please provide this ID when contacting support.
